001package squidpony.examples;
002
003import java.awt.Font;
004import java.awt.Point;
005import java.awt.event.MouseAdapter;
006import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
007import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
008import java.util.Deque;
009import java.util.LinkedList;
010import java.util.List;
011import javax.swing.JFrame;
012import javax.swing.JLayeredPane;
013import squidpony.squidgrid.FOV;
014import static squidpony.squidgrid.FOV.RIPPLE;
015import static squidpony.squidgrid.FOV.RIPPLE_LOOSE;
016import static squidpony.squidgrid.FOV.RIPPLE_TIGHT;
017import static squidpony.squidgrid.FOV.RIPPLE_VERY_LOOSE;
018import static squidpony.squidgrid.FOV.SHADOW;
019import squidpony.SColor;
020import squidpony.SColorFactory;
021import squidpony.squidgrid.Radius;
022import squidpony.squidgrid.Direction;
023import squidpony.squidgrid.gui.SquidPanel;
024import squidpony.squidgrid.gui.TextCellFactory;
025import squidpony.squidmath.RNG;
026
027/**
028 * This class shows off various FOV algorithms in an animated manner. It's meant
029 * primarily for internal testing so is a bit rough.
030 *
031 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
032 */
033public class FOVAnimated {
034
035    private static final RNG rng = new RNG();
036    private static final int cellSize = 15;
037    private static final int viewDistance = 20;
038    private int width, height;
039    private SquidPanel back, front;
040
041    private double lightMap[][], map[][];
042    private boolean indirect[][];//marks indirect lighting for Ripple FOV
043    private int type = FOV.RIPPLE_TIGHT;
044    private double radius, decay;
045    private int startx, starty;
046    private int rippleNeighbors;
047    private Radius radiusStrategy;
048    private TestMap testMap = new TestMap();
049
050    public static void main(String... args) {
051        new FOVAnimated().go();
052    }
053
054    private void go() {
055        width = testMap.width();
056        height = testMap.height();
057
058        JFrame frame = new JFrame("FOV In Action");
059        frame.getContentPane().setBackground(SColor.BLACK);
060        TextCellFactory factory = new TextCellFactory().font(new Font("Arial", Font.BOLD, 26)).width(cellSize).height(cellSize);
061        back = new SquidPanel(width, height, factory, null);
062        front = new SquidPanel(width, height, factory, null);
063
064        JLayeredPane layers = new JLayeredPane();
065        layers.setLayer(back, JLayeredPane.DEFAULT_LAYER);
066        layers.setLayer(front, JLayeredPane.PALETTE_LAYER);
067        layers.add(back);
068        layers.add(front);
069        layers.setPreferredSize(back.getPreferredSize());
070        layers.setSize(back.getPreferredSize());
071
072        frame.add(layers);
073        frame.pack();
074        frame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
075        frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
076
077        frame.setVisible(true);
078
079        SColorFactory.addPallet("colors", SColorFactory.asGradient(SColor.ALICE_BLUE, SColor.BRIGHT_PINK));
080
081        back.addMouseListener(new MouseAdapter() {
082
083            @Override
084            public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
085                if (e.getButton() == MouseEvent.BUTTON3) {
086                    back.erase();
087                    back.refresh();
088                } else {
089                    calculate(e.getX() / cellSize, e.getY() / cellSize);
090                }
091            }
092
093        });
094
095        front.erase();
096        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
097            for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
098                front.put(x, y, testMap.symbol(x, y), testMap.color(x, y));
099            }
100        }
101        front.refresh();
102
103        map = testMap.resistances();
104//        calculate();
105    }
106
107    private void calculate(final int x, final int y) {
108        Thread t = new Thread(new Runnable() {
109
110            @Override
111            public void run() {
112                back.erase();
113                back.refresh();
114//                startx = rng.between(width / 5, (width * 4) / 5);
115//                starty = rng.between(height / 5, (height * 4) / 5);
116                startx = x;
117                starty = y;
118
119                mark(startx, starty, SColor.CRIMSON);
120                calculateFOV(map, startx, starty, viewDistance, Radius.CIRCLE);
121            }
122        });
123
124        t.setDaemon(true);
125        t.start();
126    }
127
128    private void mark(int x, int y, double strength) {
129        mark(x, y, SColorFactory.desaturate(SColor.LIME, 1 - strength));
130    }
131
132    private void mark(int x, int y, SColor color) {
133        mark(x, y, color, false);
134    }
135
136    private void mark(int x, int y, SColor color, boolean temporary) {
137        BufferedImage old = back.getImage(x, y);
138        back.put(x, y, color);
139        back.refresh();
140//        try {
141//            Thread.sleep(10);
142//        } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
143//        }
144        if (temporary) {
145//            try {
146//                Thread.sleep(10);
147//            } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
148//            }
149            back.put(x, y, old);
150            back.refresh();
151        }
152    }
153
154    /**
155     * Checks to see if the location is considered even partially lit.
156     *
157     * @param x
158     * @param y
159     * @return
160     */
161    public boolean isLit(int x, int y) {
162        return lightLevel(x, y) > 0;
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Returns the light value at the given location.
167     *
168     * @param x
169     * @param y
170     * @return
171     */
172    public double lightLevel(int x, int y) {
173        if (lightMap == null) {
174            return 0;
175        } else {
176            return lightMap[x][y];
177        }
178    }
179
180    /**
181     * Returns the initial resistance value at the given point. If no calculation has yet been run, it returns 0.
182     *
183     * @param x
184     * @param y
185     * @return
186     */
187    public double resistance(int x, int y) {
188        if (map == null) {
189            return 0;
190        } else {
191            return map[x][y];
192        }
193    }
194
195    /**
196     * Calculates the Field Of View for the provided map from the given x, y coordinates. Returns a light map where the
197     * values represent a percentage of fully lit.
198     *
199     * The starting point for the calculation is considered to be at the center of the origin cell. Radius
200     * determinations based on Euclidian calculations. The light will be treated as having infinite possible radius.
201     *
202     * @param resistanceMap the grid of cells to calculate on
203     * @param startx the horizontal component of the starting location
204     * @param starty the vertical component of the starting location
205     * @return the computed light grid
206     */
207    public double[][] calculateFOV(double[][] resistanceMap, int startx, int starty) {
208        return calculateFOV(resistanceMap, startx, starty, Integer.MAX_VALUE);
209    }
210
211    /**
212     * Calculates the Field Of View for the provided map from the given x, y coordinates. Returns a light map where the
213     * values represent a percentage of fully lit.
214     *
215     * The starting point for the calculation is considered to be at the center of the origin cell. Radius
216     * determinations based on Euclidian calculations.
217     *
218     * @param resistanceMap the grid of cells to calculate on
219     * @param startx the horizontal component of the starting location
220     * @param starty the vertical component of the starting location
221     * @param radius the distance the light will extend to
222     * @return the computed light grid
223     */
224    public double[][] calculateFOV(double[][] resistanceMap, int startx, int starty, int radius) {
225        return calculateFOV(resistanceMap, startx, starty, radius, Radius.CIRCLE);
226    }
227
228    /**
229     * Calculates the Field Of View for the provided map from the given x, y coordinates. Returns a light map where the
230     * values represent a percentage of fully lit.
231     *
232     * The starting point for the calculation is considered to be at the center of the origin cell. Radius
233     * determinations are determined by the provided RadiusStrategy.
234     *
235     * @param resistanceMap the grid of cells to calculate on
236     * @param startx the horizontal component of the starting location
237     * @param starty the vertical component of the starting location
238     * @param radius the distance the light will extend to
239     * @param radiusStrategy provides a means to calculate the radius as desired
240     * @return the computed light grid
241     */
242    public double[][] calculateFOV(double[][] resistanceMap, int startx, int starty, double radius, Radius radiusStrategy) {
243        this.map = resistanceMap;
244        this.startx = startx;
245        this.starty = starty;
246        this.radius = radius;
247        this.radiusStrategy = radiusStrategy;
248        decay = 1.0 / radius;
249
250        lightMap = new double[width][height];
251        lightMap[startx][starty] = 1;//make the starting space full power
252
253        switch (type) {
254            case RIPPLE:
255                indirect = new boolean[width][height];
256                rippleNeighbors = 2;
257                doRippleFOV(startx, starty);
258                break;
259            case RIPPLE_LOOSE:
260                indirect = new boolean[width][height];
261                rippleNeighbors = 3;
262                doRippleFOV(startx, starty);
263                break;
264            case RIPPLE_TIGHT:
265                indirect = new boolean[width][height];
266                rippleNeighbors = 1;
267                doRippleFOV(startx, starty);
268                break;
269            case RIPPLE_VERY_LOOSE:
270                indirect = new boolean[width][height];
271                rippleNeighbors = 6;
272                doRippleFOV(startx, starty);
273                break;
274            case SHADOW:
275                for (Direction d : Direction.DIAGONALS) {
276                    shadowCast(1, 1.0, 0.0, 0, d.deltaX, d.deltaY, 0);
277                    shadowCast(1, 1.0, 0.0, d.deltaX, 0, 0, d.deltaY);
278                }
279                break;
280        }
281
282        return lightMap;
283    }
284
285    private void doRippleFOV(int x, int y) {
286        Deque<Point> dq = new LinkedList<>();
287        dq.offer(new Point(x, y));
288        while (!dq.isEmpty()) {
289            Point p = dq.pop();
290            if (lightMap[p.x][p.y] <= 0 || indirect[p.x][p.y]) {
291                continue;//no light to spread
292            }
293
294            for (Direction dir : Direction.OUTWARDS) {
295                int x2 = p.x + dir.deltaX;
296                int y2 = p.y + dir.deltaY;
297                if (x2 < 0 || x2 >= width || y2 < 0 || y2 >= height //out of bounds
298                        || radiusStrategy.radius(startx, starty, x2, y2) >= radius + 1) {//+1 to cover starting tile
299                    continue;
300                }
301
302                double surroundingLight = nearRippleLight(x2, y2);
303                if (lightMap[x2][y2] < surroundingLight) {
304                    lightMap[x2][y2] = surroundingLight;
305                    if (map[x2][y2] < 1) {//make sure it's not a wall
306                        dq.offer(new Point(x2, y2));//redo neighbors since this one's light changed
307                    }
308                }
309            }
310        }
311    }
312
313    private double nearRippleLight(int x, int y) {
314        if (x == startx && y == starty) {
315            return 1;
316        }
317
318//        mark(x, y, SColor.LILAC);
319
320        List<Point> neighbors = new LinkedList<>();
321        for (Direction di : Direction.OUTWARDS) {
322            int x2 = x + di.deltaX;
323            int y2 = y + di.deltaY;
324            if (x2 >= 0 && x2 < width && y2 >= 0 && y2 < height) {
325                neighbors.add(new Point(x2, y2));
326            }
327        }
328
329        if (neighbors.isEmpty()) {
330            return 0;
331        }
332
333        while (neighbors.size() > rippleNeighbors) {
334            Point p = neighbors.remove(0);
335            double dist = radiusStrategy.radius(startx, starty, p.x, p.y);
336            double dist2 = 0;
337            for (Point p2 : neighbors) {
338                dist2 = Math.max(dist2, radiusStrategy.radius(startx, starty, p2.x, p2.y));
339            }
340            if (dist < dist2) {//not the largest, put it back
341                neighbors.add(p);
342            }
343        }
344
345        double light = 0;
346        int lit = 0, indirects = 0;
347        for (Point p : neighbors) {
348            if (lightMap[p.x][p.y] > 0) {
349                lit++;
350                if (indirect[p.x][p.y]) {
351                    indirects++;
352                }
353                double dist = radiusStrategy.radius(x, y, p.x, p.y);
354                light = Math.max(light, lightMap[p.x][p.y] - dist * decay - map[p.x][p.y]);
355                mark(p.x, p.y, SColor.YELLOW, true);
356            }
357        }
358
359        if (map[x][y] >= 1 || indirects >= lit) {
360            indirect[x][y] = true;
361//            mark(x, y, SColor.SAFETY_ORANGE);
362        } else {
363            mark(x, y, light);
364        }
365        return light;
366    }
367
368    private void shadowCast(int row, double start, double end, int xx, int xy, int yx, int yy) {
369        double newStart = 0;
370        if (start < end) {
371            return;
372        }
373
374        boolean blocked = false;
375        for (int distance = row; distance <= radius && !blocked; distance++) {
376            int deltaY = -distance;
377            for (int deltaX = -distance; deltaX <= 0; deltaX++) {
378                int currentX = startx + deltaX * xx + deltaY * xy;
379                int currentY = starty + deltaX * yx + deltaY * yy;
380                double leftSlope = (deltaX - 0.5f) / (deltaY + 0.5f);
381                double rightSlope = (deltaX + 0.5f) / (deltaY - 0.5f);
382
383                if (!(currentX >= 0 && currentY >= 0 && currentX < this.width && currentY < this.height) || start < rightSlope) {
384                    continue;
385                } else if (end > leftSlope) {
386                    break;
387                }
388
389                //check if it's within the lightable area and light if needed
390                if (radiusStrategy.radius(deltaX, deltaY) <= radius) {
391                    double bright = 1 - decay * radiusStrategy.radius(deltaX, deltaY);
392                    lightMap[currentX][currentY] = bright;
393                    mark(currentX, currentY, bright);
394                }
395
396                if (blocked) { //previous cell was a blocking one
397                    if (map[currentX][currentY] >= 1) {//hit a wall
398                        newStart = rightSlope;
399                    } else {
400                        blocked = false;
401                        start = newStart;
402                    }
403                } else {
404                    if (map[currentX][currentY] >= 1 && distance < radius) {//hit a wall within sight line
405                        blocked = true;
406                        shadowCast(distance + 1, start, leftSlope, xx, xy, yx, yy);
407                        newStart = rightSlope;
408                    }
409                }
410            }
411        }
412    }
413
414    private void doSpreadFOV(int x, int y) {
415        if (lightMap[x][y] <= 0) {
416            return;//no light to spread
417        }
418
419        for (int dx = x - 1; dx <= x + 1; dx++) {
420            for (int dy = y - 1; dy <= y + 1; dy++) {
421                //ensure in bounds
422                if (dx < 0 || dx >= width || dy < 0 || dy >= height) {
423                    continue;
424                }
425
426                double r2 = radiusStrategy.radius(startx, starty, dx, dy);
427                if (r2 <= radius) {
428                    double surroundingLight = nearSpreadLight(dx, dy);
429                    if (lightMap[dx][dy] < surroundingLight) {
430                        lightMap[dx][dy] = surroundingLight;
431                        mark(dx, dy, surroundingLight);
432                        doSpreadFOV(dx, dy);//redo neighbors since this one's light changed
433                    }
434                }
435            }
436        }
437    }
438
439    private double nearSpreadLight(int x, int y) {
440        Direction dir = Direction.getDirection(startx - x, starty - y);
441        int x2 = x + dir.deltaX;
442        int y2 = y + dir.deltaY;
443        mark(x2, y2, SColor.YELLOW, true);
444
445        if (x2 < 0 || x2 >= width || y2 < 0 || y2 >= height) {
446            return 0;//no light from off the map
447        }
448
449        //find largest emmitted light in direction of source
450        double light = Math.max(Math.max(lightMap[x2][y] - map[x2][y],
451                lightMap[x][y2] - map[x][y2]),
452                lightMap[x2][y2] - map[x2][y2]);
453
454        double distance = radiusStrategy.radius(x, y, x2, y2);
455        light -= decay * distance;
456        return light;
457    }
458
459}
